entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming north 30 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
